snippet: COBERT--Shirley Schwartz, 93, of Rockville Centre, NY, passed away on January 16, 2016. She was born in the Bronx, but grew up in Atlanta, Georgia. She is predeceased by her adored husband of 64 years, Edward Cobert, whom she met when he was stationed in Georgia during WWII. She was the cherished mother of Marilyn Sochalski and Amy Cobert Haber and she is also survived by her four grandchildren, Joanna Serper, Robin Stanco, Benjamin Haber and David Haber, as well as her seven great- grandchildren, Brianna, Emma, Rachel, Sophie, Ethan, Cole and Brody. The cause of her death was progressive COPD caused by many years of cigarette smoking. In her honor, any contributions to the American Lung Association or any other charity that combats tobacco use would be greatly appreciated. Funeral services will be at Guttermans Funeral Home in Rockville Centre on January 18th at 12 noon. 1/3
